projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Performance of Next.js on Edge Networks
projects.bodyText:
- Explored different load scenarios to determine optimal function deployment: Edge Function on multiple servers or Serverless Function on a single server. Built with Next.js, Vercel and PostgreSQL. 
 Used middleware, achieved streaming, suspense, and edge capabilities for improved reliability.

projects.title: Video Content Moderation and Subtitle Generation
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a cloud-based solution using AWS services (Rekognition, Transcribe, EC2, Amplify, S3) to streamline content creation's post-production phase. Used Python Boto3 SDK to interface AWS. 
 Built with React, Flask, Python, AWS, Git.

projects.title: Google Docs Clone
projects.bodyText: - Built with React.js, Node.js and Socket IO. Stored document IDs in MongoDB to persist data.

projects.title: Image Captioning for the Visually Impaired
projects.bodyText: - A mobile application based, Deep Learning project to help the visually impaired visualize a surrounding through audio output.

projects.title: To Do List
projects.bodyText: - A chrome extension for users to track their to do list items. Published on chrome web store.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.bodyText: - A React Native app with Go as the backend to track user expenses.

projects.title: Wellness Tracker
projects.bodyText: - A Web application for users to log their fitness activities and chat with trainers
